doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Col. Md. Tauhidul Islam is a highly skilled ENT (Ear, Nose, Throat) specialist and head-neck surgeon in Dhaka, with extensive training and fellowships in otology, neurotology, sinus, skull base, and lateral skull base surgeries from esteemed institutions in Singapore, India, and the USA. He holds qualifications including MBBS (DMC), CCD, MCPS, DLO, FCPS (ENT), and has received specialized training in micro-ear surgery, thyroid, and neck procedures. Dr. Tauhidul Islam treats a wide range of ENT-related conditions such as sinusitis, tonsillitis, ear infections, hearing loss, nasal polyps, thyroid nodules, and head-neck tumors. He is currently serving as Professor and Head of the ENT Department at Armed Forces Medical College & CMH, Dhaka. He consults at Medinova Medical Services, Mirpur (Plot # 29-30, Block # Kha, Road # 1, Section # 6, Mirpur 10, Dhaka) from 6pm to 10pm, except on Fridays.
